novel face detection framework.from sentence: In this paper , we investigate the effects of two - step classification and regression on different levels of detection layers and propose a novel face detection framework , named Selective Refinement Network ( SRN ) , which selectively applies two - step classification and regression to specific levels of detection layers .

named as: Selective Two - step Classification ( STC ) module
Selective Two - step Regression ( STR ) module

network structure.from sentence: The network structure of SRN is shown in , which consists of two key modules , named as the Selective Two - step Classification ( STC ) module and the Selective Two - step Regression ( STR ) module .

applied to.from sentence: Specifically , the STC is applied to filter out most simple negative samples ( illustrated in ( a ) ) from the low levels of detection layers , which contains 88.9 % samples .

Receptive Field Enhancement ( RFE ).from sentence: In addition , we design a Receptive Field Enhancement ( RFE ) to provide more diverse receptive fields to better capture the extreme - pose faces .
